attributes.action: arrest his predecessor as a war criminal on the basis of the existence of the Downing Street memos
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To read these, search for the downing street memos on the web.

These indicate that the war against Iraq is utterly illegal in all contexts and that Tony Blair is a war criminal. He should therefore be arrested as such and delivered to the appropriate international authorities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
